alert.note: Alert for Garden; Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 29 at 6:12PM CDT until May 29 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Garden County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Sheridan County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 545 PM MDT. * At 511 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Chadron to 10 miles northwest of Ellsworth to near Oshkosh, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rushville, Oshkosh, Hay Springs, Ellsworth, Clinton, Dogtown Flats, Billys Lake, Lone Butte, Deer Lake, Britton Lake, Intersection of Highway 87 and Larabee Road, Mumper, Diamond Lake, Herman Lake, Adams Flats and Sugar Loaf Hill. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 74 and 104. Highway 250 between mile markers 1 and 48. Highway 2 between mile markers 105 and 131. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
